text: <@U6GNQ7JBU> Trying to debug a HubDB row, but getting the error: `Search 'type' missing or invalid`. The documentation doesn't specify what `type` a HubDB row is, so I don't know what to put there :smile:
It says it as a required parameter underneath portal id

Not sure I understand - the docs describe the `type` parameter this way:

`The type of document. Can be one of SITE_PAGE, BLOG_POST, or KNOWLEDGE_ARTICLE.`

So what type is a HubDB row? :slightly_smiling_face: Tried all of those, but it just returns an empty array `[]`
Example page, HubDB dynamic pages are counted as SITE_PAGE
I can update the docs to reflect
If it is being returned empty, that means it is not being indexed for some reason, I can look into it
